org.waarp.openr66.context.task

Class UnzeroedFileTask

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.waarp.openr66.context.task.AbstractTask
      • org.waarp.openr66.context.task.UnzeroedFileTask
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Runnable

    public class UnzeroedFileTask
extends AbstractTask
    This task add 1 byte to empty file if the current file is empty (0 length).

    The task will be in error only if the file is of length 0 but cannot be unzeroed.
    The content of PATH, if not empty, will be the content when unzeroed. If empty, the 'blank' character will be used.
    delay >= 1 will make a log using info level for 1, warn level for 2.
    Author:
    Frederic Bregier
